protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-114016
protocol.text: Nonacclimated control plants were transferred to a 4°C growth chamber with a 16 h photoperiod at 90 µmol m-2 s-1 for a specified period of time as indicated be the hours in the sample name. Treatments started at different times of the day as indicated by the zeitgeber time (ZT) in the sample name.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-114539
protocol.text: Leaf discs (10 mm) were taken from the tips of mature leaves, one from each individual plant. Total RNA was extracted from 3 independent discs and the same amount of Total RNA from each sample was pooled.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-114540
protocol.text: Columbia (Col-0-G1) was initially soil grown for 4 weeks in short-days (8 h) before transfer to long-days (16 h) at a day/night air temperature of 20 °C/18 °C and 150 µmol m-2 s-1 light. Experiments were started when the rosette was mature (40-45 days after germination) and completed before the inflorescence reached 0.5-2cm. Experiments [treatments] were started at different times of the day as indicated by the hours after dawn [zeitgeber time (ZT)] in the sample name. The time of day of harvest can be calculated by adding the treatment duration to this ZT.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-114656
protocol.text: gcrma (package version 2.8.1) implemented in bioconductor (version 2.0) for R version 2.5.1. Default settings.
